text:
'This Is My Husband,’ PC Blushes As She Introduces Nick Jonas To Everyone & We're Swooning
'This Is My Husband,’ PC Blushes As She Introduces Nick Jonas To Everyone & We're Swooning
That feeling when you call someone yours is a feeling out of the world. To be in love is like feeling on top of the world.
Newly-weds Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas are experiencing the same happy feeling at the moment. They cannot stop gushing over each other, and why not! They have found love in each other.
AFP
Yesterday, at their Mumbai reception, Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas proclaimed their love for each other. PC introduced the love of her life to her friends from the industry and she couldn’t stop blushing as she said, “This is my husband, Nick Jonas.”
AFP
Without further ado, watch the video below:
Don't Miss 161 SHARES 389 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 186 SHARES 185 SHARES
Yeah, that’s what love looks like! They make such a lovely couple, right? Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas, may you stay happy together forever!
title: 'This Is My Husband,’ PC Blushes As She Introduces Nick Jonas To Everyone & We're Swooning
description: Yesterday, at their Mumbai reception, Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas proclaimed their love for each other. PC introduced the love of her life to her friends from the industry and she couldn’t stop blushing as she said, “This is my husband, Nick Jonas.”
